text: Pablo Santos González (; born 15 June 1984, in Granada, Spain) is a Spanish professional tennis player. He has won three ATP Challenger titles, all in doubles. ==ATP Tournaments Finals== ===Runner-Up (1)=== {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#eeeeee" |Legend |- bgcolor="#e5d1cb" |ATP Challenger Series |} {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#efefef" |width=35|No. |width=100|Date |width=160|Tournament |width=70|Surface |width=180|Opponent in the final |width=180|Score in the final |-bgcolor="#e5d1cb" | 1. | 16 June 2008 | Bytom, Poland | Clay | Laurent Recouderc | 3–6, 4–6 |} ==Notes== == References == ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:Spanish male tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Granada Category:1984 births
title: Pablo Santos (tennis)
